post_title: Looking to Buy... anyone with a Green Cobb $3k to $5k range ?
post_content:
I currently need 3 cards to put my set at 50% (262/524) complete. Would love to pick up a Green Cobb as one of the 3. I'm going for off-backs, but anyback is good for this one. Interested to see if there's anything available in my price range (maxing out around $5k). Thanks in advance.
-Ryan
208-991-8528

Ryan, check out the one in the LOTG auction right now.  May be in your wheelhouse & price-range.

Good luck!  I'll be in your situation soon enough :)

Bill
